title: Use of weak MD5 hash for security. Consider usedforsecurity=False

context.title: Use of weak MD5 hash for security. Consider usedforsecurity=False
context.description:
Use of weak MD5 hash for security. Consider usedforsecurity=False

Test: hashlib (B324)
Confidence: HIGH

107         )
context.remediation: Review code and follow security best practices.
